text: Esko Jussila (born 22 April 1934) is a Finnish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Finland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:People from Hollola
title: Esko Jussila
